name: o9u9r9o9b9o9r9o9s
description:
This is the demo for o9u9r9o9b9o9r9o9s chapter one: The Cabin Beyond The Forest. 

"You have stumbled upon an RPG Maker game they say was found on a micro SD card washed out of a storm drain,  It was embedded in a surgically removed human tooth."

Embark on a journey into a abandoned  virtual world said to be destroyed by an artificial intelligence. Uncover the truth of what really happened here. 

o9u9r9o9b9o9r9o9s is a psychological survival horror game with traditional role playing fantasy and dark cyberpunk influences. 

The track in the first chamber and the track  at the city of Arcadia are composed, written and produced by Dark Somnium Music. Talented musician. Please be sure to check out their work. 

Mother's Lullaby: "Mothers Lullaby" Piano and Violin music - YouTube

And

The Other Side: "The Other Side" The Left Right Game Soundtrack - YouTube

The remaining OST was written and recorded by 64usernames.

Players gain or spend sanity though combat or found encounter cards. These will effect the environment and your experience in story mode. 

Choose from Rogue, Warrior, Mystic and Engineer. More classes are planned in future updates. 

o9u9r9o9b9o9r9o9s is a first person survival horror game made in RPG Maker using the MV3D Plugin by Cutievirus. 

Art Credits:

Owl Monks- "Death Sprite" created by whtdragon
The Crawling Death- "Catapillar" created By Avery
Lost Knight- "Skeleton Leader" Created by Matseb
Complete set- Mack's VX Style Style Sprites

This is still considered a work in development and Glyphic Labs welcomes any feedback  from players.
